select r.reply_id, r.board_free_id, case when b.business_id is null then m.member_id else null end as member_id, b.business_id, r.reply_content, r.reply_register_date, r.reply_update_date, member_email, member_password, member_phone_number, member_name, member_register_date, member_status, member_img_original_name, member_img_uuid, member_img_path, business_email, business_password, business_ceo_name, business_number, business_company_name, business_phone_number, business_establishment_date, business_register_date, business_status, business_img_original_name, business_img_uuid, business_img_path, business_location, business_category from bugjeog.tbl_free_reply r left join bugjeog.tbl_business b on r.business_id = b.business_id left join bugjeog.tbl_member m on r.member_id = m.member_id where board_free_id = #{boardFreeId} order by r.reply_id desc limit #{cri.offset}, #{cri.rowCount}
